notes: Recently renovated unfurnished apartment in excellent condition with modern recessed and cove LED lighting, light wood laminate flooring, split AC units, and clean white/grey walls. The 7th floor unit in a 22-story building has good natural light from large windows with decorative iron railings that appear secure for baby safety; no visible balcony access, sharp corners are minimal, and the flat open layout is baby-friendly.
